mapper.insert: insert into openexperiment.time_limit(limit_type, start_time, end_time) values (#{limitType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.update: update openexperiment.time_limit set start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime} where limit_type = #{limitType}
mapper.select: select limit_type as limitType, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime from openexperiment.time_limit
